DataElement.preferredName: Contributing Cause of Death Reason Other Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text that describes a circumstance or condition that resulted in the death of a living being which is different than the one(s) previously specified.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 7/19/17 jk transferred context and added registration status, CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 4/28/15 released. jc  4/7/15 VD versioned per COG WG: inc to 100 char, remove min limit, chg concept domain to assessment result. jc 1/25/13 added ACRIN Old caBIG CSI.  3/21/12 - changed origin from IVI to ACRIN.  3/5/08 - released for UoWASH FES CRF.   7/23/07-created for ACRIN PET CDEs

DataElement.changeDescription: 7/21/17 jk Added CSI per Round 5 finalization task; CDE already Standard/NCI Standard context. 5/3/16 registration set to Proposed per results of 2015 COD Harmonization WG.  12/2/15 corrected typo in question/tt_4/28/15 Released; changed reg status to Qualified. jc  4/7/15 created based on recommendation of the COD Harmonization WG using versioned VD. jc
